info.title: Courier
info.description: Courier is a service and web studio for development teams to manage all product-triggered communications (email, chat, in-app, SMS, push, etc.) in one place. Courier is built for developers who want to deliver an exceptional notification experience.

post.description: Sends a message to one or more recipients.

get.description: Returns the specified audience by identifier.

put.description: Creates or updates an audience based on the parameters and filters provided.

get.description: Retrieve a list of members of an audience.
Retrieve all audiences associated with your account.
Retrieve a list of audit events.
Retrieve a specific audit event by identifier.

post.description: Invoke an automation run from an automation template.
Invoke an automation in an ad-hoc run.
Creates a new brand from the settings provided.

get.description: Retrieve a specific brand by identifier.

post.description: Creates a bulk job for the message parameters provided.

get.description: Retrieve the information about a bulk job.

post.summary: Add users to a bulk job
post.description: Ingest user data into a bulk job.

get.description: Retrieve the users of a bulk job.
Retrieve a list of all the recipient lists.
Retrieve the items of a list.

delete.description: Deletes a list by list identifier.

put.description: Creates or replaces an existing list with the supplied values.
Restores an existing list by identifier.

get.description: Retrieves the subscriptions for a list.

post.description: Add additional subscribers to a list.

delete.summary: Unsubscribe a user from a list
delete.description: Deletes a subscription to a list by list and recipient identifiers.

get.description: Retrieve the statuses of previously sent messages.
Retrieve the status of a message.
Retrieve the events of a previously sent message.
Retrieve the content of a previously sent message.

put.description: Request that a message be archived.

post.description: Merge the supplied values with an existing profile or create a new profile if one doesn't already exist.

patch.description: Updates on a portion of a profile.
